content: 2 double_crochet in the same corner space * skip over to the opening between the granny cluster of sts and place 3 double_crochet in the next corner space place 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet repeat from * until all four sides are completed in the last corner place 3 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the top of the chain 3 to complete the round round 4 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet and turn your work place 2 double_crochet in the same corner space * skip over to the opening between the granny cluster of sts and place 3 double_crochet repeat from * until the corner space in the corner space place 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in the last corner place 3 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the top of the chain 3 to complete the round repeat round 4 until your project reaches the desired size the perfect granny rectangle set up/round 1 chain 19 insert 1 double_crochet in the third chain from the hook place 1 double_crochet in each chain until the end chain 1 then go back into the same st with 3 double_crochet chain 1 then place 1 more double_crochet into the same st insert 1 double_crochet into each st across opposite the double_crochet from the other side until the end in the last st 1 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 slip st to the first st to close the round round 2 turn your work slip st into the chain 1 space from previous round and chain 3 counts as a double_crochet then go back into the same chain 1 space with 2 more double_crochet skip over to the next chain 1 space insert 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet * skip 2 sts and in the next st place 3 double_crochet continue placing 3 double_crochet in every third st until the end of the side in the chain 1 space corner place 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet skip over to next chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet repeat * in the last corner space 3 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the top of the chain 3 to close the round round 3 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet and turn your work place 2 double_crochet in the same corner space * skip over to the opening between the granny cluster of sts and place 3 double_crochet repeat from * including the short sides until the corner space in the corner space place 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet continue from * until the last corner in the last corner place 3 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the top of the chain 3 to complete the round repeat round 3 until you ve reached the desired size copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn video tutorials available on youtube @juantheyarnaddict addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for
